paragraphs: I need to mind where I sleep in these ruins. I nearly died of fright this evening after nodding off at my work. I woke to the sensation of being enveloped by some giant serpent and nearly pitched myself over a ledge with all my thrashing. I'd just become entangled in some of the vines during my nap.
I must have been dreaming something interesting to have gotten myself so wrapped up. Damned if I could remember after the rude awakening.
